name: Herding Cats (FoozleCC)
description:
Game submitted for Xanderjam 4!  Theme: Opposites

I had some fun incorporating this theme with the following play on it:

  • Left Hand and Right Hand controls
  • Cats and Dogs (also black / white coloring)
  • Positive and Negative Charge (Developed algorithm to simulate positive and negative charges in a 2d plane.  The players (dogs) charge gets stronger the longer you go without being hit and it helps you herd the cats.)

Rate here: https://itch.io/jam/xanderjam-4-summer-jam/rate/1133958

CONTROLS:

WASD for Lefty, IJKL for Righty

GOAL:

Save as many cats in 150s as possible.

Hope you enjoy! I really enjoyed the implementation of the charged particles simulation.  Not sure how that turned into this bloody cat mess.

Cheers! FoozleCC

https://www.youtube.com/c/FoozleCC

Lastly - if you use Construct 3 and you want to see how I created the blood effects / staining from these poor creatures check out the youtube video below (note I did this video prior to the jam and reworked it during the jam to work for the new game)

Notes: Much of the artwork was not produced by myself during the jam as I focused on the development of game. 

Music Credits: Xanderwood (since its his jam I figured it was appropriate)
